long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ARTU Meetings: Your Meeting's Personal Scribe!

Install ARTU to receive automatic meeting minutes for your Google Meet and Microsoft Teams meetings directly in your email.

Artu is your essential tool for keeping a record of all your important conversations. And now, with our latest version, we've elevated this experience to the next level. Discover what's new and enhance your meetings today!

Key Features:

🎙️ Real-Time Transcription: ARTU 2 uses advanced AI technology to transcribe your meetings in real-time, allowing you to focus on the conversation instead of taking notes.

📝 Smart Summaries: ARTU 2 doesn't just transcribe; it also generates concise summaries of your meetings, highlighting key points, assigned tasks, and decisions made.

🔐 Enhanced Security: Your transcriptions are safe with us. We've bolstered security and reaffirmed our commitment to your privacy.

🌐 Microsoft Teams Integration: New! ARTU now integrates with Microsoft Teams, expanding our capabilities and making meeting minutes management even more efficient.

🎯 Improved Accuracy: Provide ARTU 2 with more context about you and your meetings for more accurate and effective summaries.

⚙️ Customizable Settings: Personalize your experience with new customization options in ARTU 2, tailoring the tool to your specific needs.

📱 ARTU Mini: Maximize your screen space during meetings with many participants with ARTU Mini, a more compact version for more efficient viewing.

🎨 Custom Style: Choose from five new colors to give ARTU a look you'll love.

🏢 ARTU Corporate: Explore our corporate options with data storage solutions. Contact us at artu@cm64.studio

Install ARTU today and experience a new way to conduct your online meetings. If you're new to ARTU, discover how you can receive automatic meeting minutes and enjoy all the enhanced features we offer. Your efficiency and productivity have never been better. Download it now!
